problems.text: Ben sells candies in a pattern: 3 on day 1, 6 on day 2, 9 on day 3. How many will he sell on day 15?
A wall is built by placing 10 bricks on the first row, 13 on the second, and so on. How many bricks are in 7 rows?
A student scores 5 points in game 1, 8 in game 2, 11 in game 3. What is the total score after 6 games?
A gardener plants 2 trees the first day, 5 on the second, 8 on the third, continuing the pattern. How many trees after 6 days?
